goal.tools.debugger

Class BreakPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.debugger.BreakPoint

  • public class BreakPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    stores information about a breakpoint that was placed in the code manually by the user. These are shown in the editor with the 'markers'.
    Author:
    W.Pasman 18apr2012

    • Constructor Detail

      • BreakPoint

        public BreakPoint(java.io.File file,
          int linenumber,
          BreakPoint.Type type)
        Creates new breakpoint. You still need to tell the relevant services (e.g., AgentService, about it.
        Parameters:
        file - is the file that this breakpoint is in.
        linenumber - is the line number where the breakpoint is. 0 is first line.
        type - is the type of this breakpoint.
